Pregnant lactate Condition contraindicate enteral feeding ( i.e . intestinal obstruction ) Lack enteral access Parenteral nutrition Any condition would contraindicate use study product ( i.e . need severe fluid restriction , cow 's milk protein allergy , etc . ) Subject Investigator 's assessment expect comply study protocol Currently participate another conflict clinical trial .
